records.text: In the end, it wasn't the bad reputation of their surly punk proprietor or his 'The Customer is Always a F**king Asshole!' approach to small business that began souring my relationship with my favourite pub. It was the ever-present mouse and eventually, the staff's willful ambivalence to its presence. They even answered their patrons' shocked expressions with a simple pronouncement of the name they'd given it. The rodent was as welcome there as I was, and that felt irrecoverably diminishing.

records.text: Да купите дистрибуторна капачка втора употреба е отлично решение, когато установите, че старата ви капачка е повредена. It was the ever-present mouse and eventually, the staff's willful ambivalence to its presence. They even answered their patrons' shocked expressions with a simple pronouncement of the name they'd given it. The rodent was as welcome there as I was, and that felt irrecoverably diminishing.
